summary: AN ORDINANCE accepting transmission line easements over portions of Section 11, Township 25 North, Range 4 East, W.M.; Section 16, Township 24 North, Range 5 East, W.M.; vacated Slater Avenue N.E.; Section 29, Township 23 North, Range 5 East, W.M.; Section 21, Township 26 North, Range 5 East, W.M.; as described below and placing said easements under the jurisdiction of the City Light Department.
